links.title: Netflix and Alphabet will need to become ISPs, fast
links.description: This week completely scrambled the video landscape, and its implications are going to take months to fully understand. First is the district court's decision to approve the merger of AT&T and Time Warner announced just moments ago. That will create one of the largest content creation and distribution companies in the world when it closes.

links.title: Apple Unveils Revised Cryptocurrency and ICO Guidelines for the App Store
links.description: Tech giant Apple has officially revised cryptocurrency and initial coin offering (ICO) guidelines for the dedicated section of MacOS and iOS apps featured on . The previous section of Apple guidelines specific to cryptocurrencies and ICOs was released December 20, 2017, when bitcoin prices were peaking near $20,000.
